title: A Package for Accessing the Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes
text: mtsta package provides powerful tool searching matching species names montane forests Tropical Andes region. allows users input list species names find closest matching names curated base data montane tree species region. matching process takes account exact matches fuzzy matches based user-defined maximum distance threshold.

title: A Package for Accessing the Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes
text: can install mtsta package GitHub using:

title: A Package for Accessing the Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes
text: use mtsta package, simply load call search_mtsta() function list species names input: Species distribution
code: library(mtsta)  # Example species list splist <- c("Aphelandra acantasa",             "Saurauia lehmani",             "Saurauia bullosaa",             "Schinus meyerii",             "Ilex colombiana",             "Ilex rimbachii",             "Ilex scopulorum")  mtsta::search_mtsta(splist, max_distance = 0.1) |>    dplyr::select(name_submitted, name_matched, accepted_name, accepted_family,                 taxonomic_status, distance) |>    tibble::as_tibble() #> # A tibble: 7 × 6 #>   name_submitted     name_matched accepted_name accepted_family taxonomic_status #>   <chr>              <chr>        <chr>         <chr>           <chr>            #> 1 Aphelandra acanta… nill         nill          nill            nill             #> 2 Saurauia lehmani   Saurauia le… Saurauia leh… Actinidiaceae   Accepted         #> 3 Saurauia bullosaa  Saurauia bu… Saurauia bul… Actinidiaceae   Accepted         #> 4 Schinus meyerii    Schinus mey… Schinus meye… Anacardiaceae   Accepted         #> 5 Ilex colombiana    Ilex colomb… Ilex colombi… Aquifoliaceae   Accepted         #> 6 Ilex rimbachii     Ilex rimbac… Ilex rimbach… Aquifoliaceae   Accepted         #> 7 Ilex scopulorum    Ilex scopul… Ilex scopulo… Aquifoliaceae   Accepted         #> # ℹ 1 more variable: distance <chr> mtsta::search_mtsta_distribution(splist = splist) |>    tibble::as_tibble() #> # A tibble: 7 × 6 #>   name_submitted   name_matched accepted_name distribution_wcvp taxonomic_status #>   <chr>            <chr>        <chr>         <chr>             <chr>            #> 1 Aphelandra acan… nill         nill          nill              nill             #> 2 Saurauia lehmani Saurauia le… Saurauia leh… Colombia - Ecuad… Accepted         #> 3 Saurauia bullos… Saurauia bu… Saurauia bul… Colombia - Ecuad… Accepted         #> 4 Schinus meyerii  Schinus mey… Schinus meye… Argentina - Boli… Accepted         #> 5 Ilex colombiana  Ilex colomb… Ilex colombi… Colombia - Ecuad… Accepted         #> 6 Ilex rimbachii   Ilex rimbac… Ilex rimbach… Ecuador - Peru    Accepted         #> 7 Ilex scopulorum  Ilex scopul… Ilex scopulo… Ecuador - Peru -… Accepted         #> # ℹ 1 more variable: distance <chr>

title: A Package for Accessing the Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes
text: search_mtsta() search_mtsta_distribution() functions takes list species names (splist) maximum distance value (max_distance) input. performs fuzzy matching exact matching find closest matching species names curated base data montane tree species Tropical Andes region. output data frame data submitted species name. match found within specified maximum distance, result show "nill" matched species name.

title: A Package for Accessing the Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes
text: team Regional Red List Montane Tree Species Tropical Andes (2014). research carried Natalia Tejedor Garavito Bournemouth University collaboration BGCI 20 regional experts. Source data curated base data used package reviewed validated using Taxonomic Name Resolution Service TNRS. TNRS computer-assisted tool standardizing plant scientific names, correcting spelling errors, resolving --date names current accepted names. grateful contribution TNRS validating accuracy base data.

title: mtsta_distribution: Distribution Data for Species in mtsta_tab — mtsta_distribution
text: dataset contains distribution data species included Regional Red List Montane Tree Species Tropical Andes - 2014. provides information current accepted names, distribution range, taxonomic status species. data original diatribution data updated distribution information included species.

title: mtsta_distribution: Distribution Data for Species in mtsta_tab — mtsta_distribution
mtsta_distribution: Distribution Data for Species in mtsta_tab — mtsta_distribution
text: tibble accepted_name Character vector current accepted name species. distribution Character vector indicating distribution range species. distribution_wcvp Character vector indicating distribution according World Checklist Vascular Plants (WCVP). taxonomic_status Character vector indicating taxonomic status species submitted name (e.g., "Accepted").

title: mtsta_distribution: Distribution Data for Species in mtsta_tab — mtsta_distribution
text: dataset contains information distribution species Regional Red List Montane Tree Species Tropical Andes - 2014. distribution data includes geographical range species, including countries species can found.

title: mtsta_distribution: Distribution Data for Species in mtsta_tab — mtsta_distribution

what: Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab
title: Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab
text: curated base data montane tree species found Tropical Andes region. data stored tibble 132 rows 11 columns. row represents species contains information species name, accepted name, accepted family, accepted genus, IUCN status, distribution, elevation range, assessor, description, taxonomic status.

title: Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab
Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab
text: tibble 132 rows 11 columns.

title: Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab
text: data package obtained Regional Red List Montane Tree Species Tropical Andes - 2014.

title: Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab
text: columns base data tibble follows: species_name: scientific name species. accepted_name: currently accepted name species. accepted_family: family species belongs. accepted_genus: genus species belongs. taxonomic_status: taxonomic status species. iucn: conservation status species according IUCN Red List Categories. distribution: distribution range species. unsure_distribution: Information uncertainty distribution data. elevation: elevation range species found. assessor: person group responsible assessing species. description: Additional information description species. base species list used mtsta package carefully reviewed validated assistance Taxonomic Name Resolution Service (TNRS). utilizing TNRS, base species list mtsta package guarantees accuracy consistency representation species names, enhancing reliability package's functionalities.

title: Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes - Base Data — mtsta_tab

what:
Search for Matching Species Names in the Red List of Montane Tree Species of
the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta
title:
Search for Matching Species Names in the Red List of Montane Tree Species of
the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta
text: function searches matching species names Red List Montane Tree Species Tropical Andes (mtsta package) based provided list species names. function performs approximate matching using Levenshtein distance algorithm find similar names within specified maximum distance.

title:
Search for Matching Species Names in the Red List of Montane Tree Species of
the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta

Search for Matching Species Names in the Red List of Montane Tree Species of
the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta
text: splist character vector containing species names matched. max_distance distance used generalized Levenshtein distance indicates total number insertions, deletions, substitutions allowed match two names. can expressed integer fraction binomial name. value 0 1 treated percentage string length. value greater 1 treated absolute number allowed changes. example, name length 10, max_distance = 0.1, allow one change (insertion, deletion, substitution). max_distance = 2, allows two changes. ... Additional arguments (currently unused).

title:
Search for Matching Species Names in the Red List of Montane Tree Species of
the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta
text: data frame following columns: name_submitted: submitted species names. name_matched: matched species names mtsta data. accepted_name: accepted scientific name matched species. accepted_family: accepted family name matched species. accepted_genus: accepted genus name matched species. taxonomic_status: taxonomic status matched species. iucn: conservation status matched species according IUCN Red List Categories. distribution: distribution range matched species. unsure_distribution: Information uncertainty distribution data. elevation: elevation range species found. assessor: person group responsible assessing species. description: Additional information description species. distance: Levenshtein distance submitted name matched name. match found, name_matched column contain "nill", columns empty.

title:
Search for Matching Species Names in the Red List of Montane Tree Species of
the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta
code: # Assuming you have the mtsta package loaded with the necessary data search_result <- search_mtsta(c("Aphelandra acantasa",                                 "Saurauia lehmani",                                 "Saurauia bullosaa",                                 "Schinus meyerii",                                 "Ilex colombiana",                                 "Ilex rimbachii",                                 "Ilex scopulorum"),                               max_distance = 0.1)

what: Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
title: Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
text: function searches Montane Tree Species Tropical Andes distribution database list submitted species names returns distribution information. search allows approximate string matching within given maximum distance.

title: Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
text: splist Character vector submitted plant species names distribution data searched. max_distance Numeric value representing maximum allowed distance approximate string matching. default value 0.1. typedf "main" return selected columns mtsta_distribution "full" return data

title: Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
text: data frame following columns: name_submitted Character vector submitted species names. name_matched Character vector matched species names database. accepted_name Character vector accepted names matched species. distribution Character vector distribution matched species. unsure_distribution Character vector information unsure distribution (available). distribution_wcvp Character vector distribution World Check-list Vascular Plants (WCVP) database matched species. taxonomic_status Character vector indicating taxonomic status matched species. distance Numeric vector Levenshtein distance submitted matched species names.

title: Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
text: function uses approximate string matching maximum distance specified max_distance argument. searches mtsta distribution database submitted species names match provided names within given distance. function retrieves distribution information, including accepted name, distribution region, unsure distribution (available), distribution World Check-list Vascular Plants (WCVP), taxonomic status, Levenshtein distance submitted matched species names.

title: Search Species Distribution of A Regional Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes — search_mtsta_distribution
code: # Example usage of search_mtsta_distribution function species_list <- c("Escallonia mirtilloydes", "Ilex rimbachii", "Saurauia lehmannii") distribution_data <- search_mtsta_distribution(species_list, max_distance = 0.2) print(distribution_data) #>            name_submitted            name_matched           accepted_name #> 1 Escallonia mirtilloydes Escallonia myrtilloides Escallonia myrtilloides #> 2          Ilex rimbachii          Ilex rimbachii          Ilex rimbachii #> 3      Saurauia lehmannii      Saurauia lehmannii      Saurauia lehmannii #>                                                                   distribution_wcvp #> 1 Argentina - Bolivia - Colombia - Costa Rica - Ecuador - Panama - Peru - Venezuela #> 2                                                                    Ecuador - Peru #> 3                                                                Colombia - Ecuador #>   taxonomic_status distance #> 1         Accepted        2 #> 2         Accepted        0 #> 3         Accepted        0
